title: I was LeBlanc with Ornn's recommended item set

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I was playing as LeBlanc and I had Ornn's recommended item set when I pressed 'p' for the items window.

replies.body:
No glitches, this is actually working as intended. 

It looks like, from the minimap, that you had a friendly Ornn on your team. Those Masterwork items can be built by anyone who has Ornn on their team, but you're only limited to one of them. The next game your items returned to normal because you probably didn't have an Ornn on your team.



P.S. Nice reference in your name xP
It must have been just a glitch because I played LeBlanc again and my recommended item set returned to normal.
